This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I noticed a unknown object in a picture that I took of the harbor in Newport RI on 12/17/2010.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a very sunny day in Newport RI at approximately 12:15PM. The sun was bright over the water and I thought it would make a nice picture. I did not notice anything at the time I was taking the picture. There were no sounds such as a helicoptor or aircraft. Later while looking at the picture on my computer I noticed an unusual object in the sky on the upper right side of the photo. I could not determine any explanation for this object. I thought that perhaps it was something on the camera lense so I took another picture and the object did not show up in the new picture. Photo 1 which I am attaching is the first photo with the unusual object. Photo 2 is later in the day when I decided to make sure it was not the lense of the camera. I have looked at this several times and have showed it to others and no one seems to have an explanation of what this object might be. Maybe you can. I would like to know what it is that I captured in this photo. This has me very puzzled.
